name: Life In Choices
description:
Life In Choices

A game based on key life choices; that intends to show the butterfly effect of decision making and the fragility of our own narratives.

You write your own narrative, a narrative built upon a degree of control and a degree of randomness.

You pick from two sources and you will end up with a set of life choices. 

You can use the game to reflect on your own life decisions or as a narrative tool.
